content:
TERM: Cognitive Architectures

DEFINITION:
Cognitive Architectures: SOAR:

ACT-R:

CLARION:

By integrating cognitive architectures into the SPR_compressor system, we can enable the system to reason and make decisions based on cognitive models, enhancing its ability to understand and interact with complex systems and data.

Another potential area for exploration is the integration of human-computer interaction (HCI) principles to enable the system to provide intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for users.

Confidence: 2.095
